title: Updating NODEs of every type
gherkin:
Given there exists a "<node_type>" "A"
When the user updates node "A"
Then the response should return with status code 201
And the response should contain the id of node "A"

Examples:
  | node_type     |
  | COMPANY       |
  | BRAND         |
  | CAR MODEL     |
  | RACE TRACK    |
  | TRACK LAYOUT  |
  | RACING SERIES |
  | RACING EVENT  |
  | IMAGE         |
